title: Cozy Bungalow For Immediate Sale
details:
We have an excellent fully furnished bungalow for immediate sale. free hold property

DISTANCE 1.2 km from lake Gregory 3.5 km from Nuwara Eliya town

PERCHES - 22 / LIVING SPACE - 3000SQ FT

BED ROOMS - 5 WITH ATTACHED BATHROOMS

LARGE HALL / DINING / KITCHEN / GAMES ROOM WITH POOL TABLE/TV LOUNGE / LARGE BALCONY PARKING FOR 4-5 VEHICLES LARGE GARDEN FULLY FURNISHED

UPTO 17 PEOPLE COULD BE ACCOMMODATED IN COMFORT.

FULL CEMENT FLOORS AND ALL BATHROOMS TILLED WITH HOT WATER.

BEAUTIFUL SCENERY AND VERY QUIET SITUATED NEXT TO A TEA ESTATE.

ASKING PRICE - 65 MILLION - NEGOTIABLE AFTER INSPECTION

VIEWING BY APPOINTMENT ONLY
